resources.string: Hello, and welcome to an app I like to call \'SimpleMockup\' !

Underneath this (custom) Dialog, you will find an app I built that features (what I think) is some useful stuff! A MenuDrawer with added layout tricks, and a ViewPager with a fixed/static ImageView at the top, and (if you have KitKat) a translucent app decor.
I will try and keep this updated as much as possible for you guys, adding in any code you guys request. Now, scroll down and press \'okay\'! :)

You see, this is the very first item called because oncreate returned null. I programmed the code to naturally selectItem(0) if that is the case. And because we also added a header to the listview, this makes this position 0. So, the header is the 0 position (case 0), whereas item one is case 1, and so on. If that doesn\'t make sense, then ignore my babbling and enjoy the beauty of this app. ;)
You should definitely rate this app 5 stars. ;)
Keep scrolling down! Also, this is a ViewPager. Feel free to swipe left and right as you please.
